summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.1°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.5 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.5 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.3 mm), cloud levels (up 1464 m), and light levels (up 8384 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 10.3m higher than yesterday, 846.4m lower than the past week, 1463.9m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 765m to 2220m and averaged 1276.0m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: The sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, air moisture should feel ok. Chance of light rain, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and a mix of sun and clouds. Changeable conditions.
